item.title: 조인과 서브쿼리
item.description: EMPLOYESS와 DEPT 을 JOIN하여 부서 번호, 부서명, 이름, 급여를 출력하라. SELECT HR_EMPLOYEES.DEPARTMENT_ID, DEPARTMENT_NAME, LAST_NAME, SALARY FROM HR_EMPLOYEES INNER JOIN HR_DEPARTMENTS ON HR_EMPLOYEES.DEPARTMENT_ID = HR_DEPARTMENTS.DEPARTMENT_ID 이름이 ‘HALL&rsq
